targets.rawSql:
WITH time_ranges AS (
    SELECT 
        $time_range as range_label,
        CASE $time_range
            WHEN '1m'  THEN now() - interval '1 min'
            WHEN '5m'  THEN now() - interval '5 min'
            WHEN '15m'  THEN now() - interval '15 min'
            WHEN '30m'  THEN now() - interval '30 min'
            WHEN '1h'  THEN now() - interval '1 hour'
            WHEN '2h'  THEN now() - interval '2 hours'
            WHEN '3h'  THEN now() - interval '3 hours'
            WHEN '4h'  THEN now() - interval '4 hours'
            WHEN '5h'  THEN now() - interval '5 hours'
            WHEN '6h'  THEN now() - interval '6 hours'
            WHEN '7h'  THEN now() - interval '7 hours'
            WHEN '8h'  THEN now() - interval '8 hours'
            WHEN '16h' THEN now() - interval '16 hours'
            WHEN '24h' THEN now() - interval '24 hours'
            WHEN '3d' THEN now() - interval '3 days'
            WHEN '7d' THEN now() - interval '7 days'
            WHEN '15d' THEN now() - interval '15 days'
        END as range_from
),
station_cycles AS (
    SELECT 
        ct.sequence_id,
        s.sequence_name,
        tr.range_label,
        PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ct.cycle_time_seconds) as cycle_time_sec,
        PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ct.desired_cycle_time_seconds) as desired_cycle_sec
    FROM cycle_times ct
    JOIN sequences s ON ct.sequence_id = s.sequence_id
    CROSS JOIN time_ranges tr
    WHERE ct.time >= tr.range_from
        AND s.is_active = true
    GROUP BY ct.sequence_id, s.sequence_name, tr.range_label
),
station_ta AS (
    SELECT 
        ta.sequence_id,
        tr.range_label,
        AVG(ta.ta_percent) as avg_ta
    FROM technical_availability ta
    JOIN sequences s ON ta.sequence_id = s.sequence_id
    CROSS JOIN time_ranges tr
    WHERE ta.time >= tr.range_from
        AND s.is_active = true
    GROUP BY ta.sequence_id, tr.range_label
)
SELECT 
    sc.sequence_name,
    sc.range_label as "Time Range",
    ROUND((
        COALESCE(sta.avg_ta, 0) / 100.0 *
        (sc.desired_cycle_sec / NULLIF(sc.cycle_time_sec, 0)) *
        100
    )::numeric, 1) as "OEE %"
FROM station_cycles sc
LEFT JOIN station_ta sta 
    ON sc.sequence_id = sta.sequence_id 
    AND sc.range_label = sta.range_label
ORDER BY "OEE %" ASC;
